title: Bada Bagh
description: A garden complex with royal cenotaphs that offer a glimpse into Jaisalmer's rich history and stunning views of the desert.

title: Desert National Park
description: A protected area in the Thar Desert, offering a chance to experience desert wildlife and ecosystems.

title: Gadisar Lake
description: A man-made lake in Jaisalmer, surrounded by temples and shrines, offering scenic views and boat rides.

title: Jain Temples (Inside Jaisalmer Fort)
description: A series of intricately designed temples located within Jaisalmer Fort, known for their beautiful architecture and historical significance.

title: Kuldhara Village
description: An abandoned village on the outskirts of Jaisalmer, known for its mysterious history and ghostly legends.

title: Longewala War Memorial
description: A tribute to the soldiers of the Indo-Pak war of 1971, located near the border and offering an immersive experience of India's war history.

title: Nathmal Ki Haveli
description: An exquisite haveli with intricate carvings, showcasing the grandeur and craftsmanship of Jaisalmer's golden era.

title: Patwon Ki Haveli
description: A famous haveli in Jaisalmer, known for its detailed architecture and fascinating history.

title: Salim Singh Ki Haveli
description: A historic haveli with a distinct arched roof, known for its unique design and historical importance.

title: Tanot Mata Temple
description: A temple near the Indo-Pak border, associated with the miraculous survival of the area during heavy shelling in the 1971 war.

title: Vyas Chhatri
description: A collection of cenotaphs dedicated to the sage Vyasa, offering panoramic views of Jaisalmer and its golden dunes.
